title: Mayura Mohana Haaram Set - Emerald, Ruby, and Diamond Perfection
features: A stunning three-layered Haaram featuring intricately crafted peacock (Mayura) motifs at the shoulders. Each layer showcases a delicate dance of emeralds, rubies, and diamonds set in a floral design. The matching Jhumka features the same intricate diamond work and a lustrous cultured pearl drop. The setting style is a combination of prong and bezel, highlighting the gemstones' brilliance. Antique finish adds a touch of timeless elegance. 'Addigai' style layered design.
colors: Predominantly Gold with vibrant Emerald Green
and sparkling White (Diamonds). The pearl adds a subtle creamy hue.
occasions: or any grand event. Makes a treasured family heirloom (Vaddanam).
description: This Mayura Mohana Haaram set is a masterpiece of traditional South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The combination of emeralds, rubies, and diamonds is considered highly auspicious. The Hyderabadi polish adds a lustrous shine that enhances the beauty of the gold. The intricate design and impeccable quality make this a truly special and investment-worthy piece. Exquisite gemstone quality and fine craftsmanship ensure both beauty and durability.
